name: intro1
text: The darkness of the ocean depths hypnotizes you and seems to call out to you. Their mysterious shadows dance around you, enchanting and unfathomable. Each movement draws you closer to the unknown, where the secrets of the deep are whispered in a liquid silence.

name: intro2
text: The bottom is not visible from your height. It gives way to a deep, opaque, and uniform blue. It leaves you with a mixed feeling of fear and curiosity. What could be hiding below, out of sight?

name: intro3
text: You take your last breath, filling your lungs with air like a final link to the world above. Then, in an almost ritual gesture, you dip your head under the water. Silence suddenly envelops you.

name: intro4
text: The air fills your lungs one last time, like an ephemeral farewell to the surface. With a fluid movement, you slip beneath the waters. The world becomes silence.

name: intro5
text: The atmosphere fills your ribcage one last time, like a goodbye to your native element. In a mastered dance, you cross the liquid border. The world suddenly falls silent.

name: landscape1
text: The seaweed dances gently, swayed by the ocean's breath. They form green waves inviting you to discover their secret world, where every leaf hides a fragment of an underwater story.
choice: Lose yourself in the floating waves of seaweed

name: landscape2
text: In this mineral landscape bathed in amber light, a small shell stands as the solitary sentinel of a mysterious underwater world.
choice: Approach a point standing out from a rock

name: landscape4
text: Under the ocean, the landscape gives birth to life. Each rocky crevice becomes a thriving ecosystem, home to a diversity of species. From the fleeting to the permanent, these underwater micro-habitats testify to the richness of aquatic life.

name: landscape5
text: Light, a vital source, reveals the beauty of the ocean floor. Its rays sculpt the underwater landscape, illuminating the sand and enhancing its contours.

name: landscape6
text: Distant travelers gaze at the ocean's surface, as one would admire a starry sky.

name: landscape7
text: The statue of Neptune stands proudly, frozen in the water. His imposing features watch over the ocean like a silent king. Nature and art meet here, where the ocean slowly takes possession of what man has created.
choice: You feel watched from your left

name: landscape9
text: In front of this figure, time seems to stand still, witnessing a forgotten past. The water gently touches its contours, as if to bring it back to life, but it remains immobile, observing the mysteries of the depths.

name: landscape11
text: A group of statues rests on the ocean floor, frozen in an eternal moment. Around them, the ocean continues its infinite cycle, unaware of their presence, slowly covering them with a thriving ecosystem.
choice: Approach a scene frozen under the waves

name: landscape13
text: Hermit crabs reign over this marine microcosm. Nestled in their borrowed shells, they roam the heights of the ecosystem, dominating the underwater landscape with their unique presence.

name: landscape14
text: A statue of a woman rests under the sea, her features softly eroded by time. She seems to be waiting for something or someone, frozen in this aquatic realm where time stretches endlessly.

name: landscape16
text: Majestic, it sits at the heart of a vast sandy expanse. This anchor, now freed from its ship, rests immobile. A silent witness of a bygone era, it retains in its metal the imprints of distant voyages and maritime adventures of yesteryear.

name: landscape17
text: A vast landscape stretches out before your eyes, filled with colorful life. Every corner seems to hide a new wonder, and you feel both lost and in awe in this living canvas woven by the ocean.
choice: Surrender to the beauty of the landscape

name: animal1
text: Emerging from its shell, it stares at you with an intrigued look. This small creature, like its companions, survives thanks to a borrowed shell. Yet this one seems to proudly display its own natural home.

name: animal2
text: Between the rocks, a shifting shape. A watchful eye and tentacles ready to react in a flash, invisible to inattentive eyes.

name: animal3
text: Its tentacles unfold slowly, drawing hypnotic arabesques in the water. The octopus is a silent specter, a dancer in a ballet known only to the ocean, unpredictable and graceful in its eternal quest.
choice: Observe the grace of a moving octopus

name: animal4
text: It moves slowly, majestic and mysterious, the slipper lobster seems almost unreal. Its shell tells the story of millennia, each step on the sand resonates like a distant memory anchored in the depths.

name: animal5
text: Lurking in the dark depths of the ocean, the moray eel remains still, patient, and watchful, waiting for the right moment to dart out of its underwater lair.

name: animal7
text: The fish glides between the rocks, inviting you to follow its secret path. Every stone tells a story, and beneath the seaweed, hidden treasures await. You let yourself be guided, in harmony with this world invisible from the surface.

name: animal8
text: A solitary fish glides between the rocks, its scales catching the light in fleeting flashes. Its path seems endless, taking a part of the ocean with it at each flick of its fin.

name: animal9
text: Invisible at first glance, the octopus blends into its environment, the master of camouflage. With each subtle movement, it reveals its presence, and with it, the secrets of the ocean.

name: animal10
text: The blenny watches you, hidden between the rocks. Its sharp eyes observe every movement, a discreet witness to the underwater world. You feel like an intruder in its secret kingdom, where every corner holds a story.

name: animal11
text: The moray eel watches you from its rocky lair, its serpentine body lurking in the shadows. It is the guardian of the depths, reminding you that the ocean hides far more than it reveals.

name: animal12
text: A large school of barracudas has taken residence in your exploration zone, transforming this peaceful reef into a formidable hunting ground. Their silver, streamlined silhouettes glide silently through the clear water, their watchful eyes scanning the surroundings. While they are not naturally aggressive toward divers, caution is still advised.
choice: There seems to be movement to your right

name: animal14
text: A massive school of damselfish stands before you, forming a living wall that undulates in the azure waters. These thousands of small fish move in unison, creating a supple, flowing veil that gracefully shifts with the currents, like a curtain of marine silk pulsing to the rhythm of the ocean.

name: animal16
text: The starfish lies motionless on the sandy bottom. Its arms stretch slowly, touching the sea as if to measure infinity. In its stillness, it captures the mystery of the ocean, an eternal guardian of its secrets.

name: animal18
text: The jellyfish floats, elusive and fragile, like a dream undulating beneath the waves. Its movements are a gentle melody, an echo of the ocean's peaceful rhythm, almost out of time.

name: animal35
text: The grouper swims, imposing and peaceful, its massive silhouette standing out in the deep blue. It is the silent king of these waters, and you feel small in its infinite kingdom, where each movement is a demonstration of quiet strength.

name: human2
text: A figure cuts through the water, it's another diver. He slows down to your level, his gaze captivated by something below. His eyes, widened behind his mask, betray a fascinating discovery. What does the abyss beneath your feet conceal?

name: human9
text: A school of silver fish suddenly swirls, captivating your gaze. Through this aquatic dance, a human form appears, blurry and distant. It's a freediver, her slender silhouette almost blending into the blue.

name: human16
text: A cloud of damselfish suddenly stirs, their small, electric blue bodies shimmering in the light. Through this living curtain, a silhouette emerges, indistinct.
choice: Look at a small school of fish between two rocks

name: human18
text: In the distance, a female silhouette emerges in the deep blue. Motionless, she watches a fleeting spectacle: a school of silver fish glides past her, their scales shimmering under the sun's filtered rays. In a coordinated movement, the school suddenly pivots, stretching toward the underwater horizon. The diver remains suspended, a silent witness to this aquatic exodus, as the last fish disappear into the vastness.
choice: A school of fish passes in front of you

name: outro1
text: In mid-ascent, your silhouette rises slowly. A moment frozen between the shadow of the depths and the light calling you to the surface.

name: outro2
text: In the distance, silver bubbles rise in shimmering columns, betraying the presence of an invisible group of divers in the depths. These ephemeral spheres form a delicate curtain that stretches along the intense blue of the ocean, creating an ethereal boundary between your underwater world and the surface.

name: outro3
text: You can finally breathe, taking a moment to appreciate the brief but intense adventure that just unfolded before you. The memories of the events that just occurred still dance in your mind, leaving an indelible mark on your heart.

name: outro4
text: Your lungs crave air, and you ascend the depths with urgency, feeling the surface approaching like a promise. The water becomes lighter, and with it, your heart opens to the light that awaits you.

name: outro5
text: The air is running low, but before you surface, you share a magical moment with your aquatic companions, silent witnesses to this secret universe. Their presence invites you to stay a little longer, to enjoy the tranquility of this silent kingdom.
choice: Enjoy a moment of communion with the fish

name: outro6
text: As you ascend to the surface, you release a few air bubbles that escape like ephemeral memories. Slowly, everything fades around you, like a curtain falling at the end of a play, leaving behind an aura of mystery and emotion.

name: outro7
text: You finally surface, your head above the water, breathless but free. The day is coming to an end, and the orange hues of the setting sun are gently reflected on the surface, creating a living tableau of softness and serenity.
choice: Contemplate the sunset on the surface

name: outro8
text: You see the sun slowly slipping below the horizon, its golden rays mingling with the deep hues of the sky. This spectacle, both calming and captivating, evokes a feeling of peace and promise for the night to come.
